description:
In this session, I share my experience transitioning from SpringBoot to Django. As a developer accustomed to the Java ecosystem, I will talk about the challenges, differences, and fun moments encountered while adapting to Django. This session will be helpful for those curious about switching between frameworks.

Jihoon Lee
Hello! I am an active developer with a background in Java and SpringBoot. Recently, I have started exploring Django and am passionate about sharing my learning journey. Nice to meet you!

related_urls.label: SpringBoot to Django: My Adaptation Story - PyCon Korea 2024

title: SpringBoot to Django: My Adaptation Story - Jihoon Lee [PyCon.KR 2024]
